title: 'GEOG 441 S2025 - Lecture 1 -pt 2'
format:

---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library('ggplot2')

# generate data
r <- seq(0, 2, by = 0.01)
theta <- 2*pi*r
df <- data.frame(theta, r)

# ggplot returns an object
ggplot(df, aes(x = theta, y = r)) +
  geom_path() +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0.5, 1, 1.5, 2)) +
  coord_polar() +
  theme_minimal()
```
